title: Dawn of Liberty
description: The year is 1992, and Matthew and Sabina return to a united Germany to attend an evangelism conference and to find a way to visit Lebenhaus, the Dortmann estate. Meanwhile, their son, Tad, while researching a story for a world news organization, meets a young woman. He starts her thinking about the God she knew as a teenager and becomes embroiled in a conspiracy that threatens to destroy the newfound freedom of the Eastern Bloc nations.
author: Michael R. Phillips
